name: eventify
description: Tiny event emitter with strict TypeScript typings and optional schema validation.
author: Bermi Ferrer <bermi@bermilabs.com>

scripts.build:all: bun run build && bun run build:types
scripts.bench: bun run build && bun run bench/bench.mjs
scripts.bench:browser: bun run build && bunx playwright test -c bench/playwright.config.mjs
scripts.bench:all: bun run bench && bun run bench:patterns && bun run bench:structures && bun run bench:node && bun run bench:node:patterns && bun run bench:node:structures && bun run bench:browser
scripts.test:browser: bun run build && bunx playwright test
scripts.test:all: bun test --coverage && bun run typecheck:tests && bun run build && bunx playwright test
